# SCNAudioPlayer

**Class**

A controller for playback of a positional audio source in a SceneKit scene.

## Declaration

```swift
class SCNAudioPlayer
```

## Overview

An [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNAudioPlayer] object controls playback of a positional audio source in a SceneKit scene. To use positional audio, first create a reusable [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNAudioSource] or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioNode] object to provide an audio stream. Then, create an audio player to control the playback of that audio source. Finally, attach the audio player to an [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNNode] object for spatialized 3D audio playback based on the position of that node relative to the scene’s [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNSceneRenderer/audioListener] node.

## Creating an Audio Player

- **init(source:)**: Initializes an audio player for playing the specified simple audio source.
- **init(avAudioNode:)**: Initializes an audio player for playing the specified AVFoundation audio node.

## Working with Audio Sources

- **audioSource**: The source of audio played by this player.
- **audioNode**: The audio node SceneKit uses for mixing audio from this player.

## Responding to Playback

- **willStartPlayback**: A block called by SceneKit when playback of the player’s audio source is about to begin.
- **didFinishPlayback**: A block called by SceneKit when playback of the player’s audio source has completed.

## Audio

- **SCNAudioSource**: A simple, reusable audio source—music or sound effects loaded from a file—for use in positional audio playback.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
